string.text: Box in truck
What's the best possible spot in the abandoned army base for stashing stuff? Answer: a hidden box in an already ransacked truck.
Barracks
You can find tons of spots in the barracks for stashing things. Just make sure no one else thinks to look where you picked.
Warehouse box
I doubt someone would want to dig up dusty old boxes in an abandoned base. Can't go wrong with this place.
Gas oven
I'll leave my second backpack in the old oven. It's full of junk I don't need right now.
Pipe in tower
Guess I'll make a stash for my extra stuff on one of the inner protrusions on the tower. The local wildlife should serve as good defense.
Burnt-down house
There's a hard-to-reach crate in the ruins of the burnt house. There's also that pack of bloodsuckers running around outdoors, so I doubt anyone will poke their nose into my stash.
Old shack
I've been watching this guy for a few days by now. He's always in the village bringing junk of all sorts to his little shack. Should shake him down so he doesn't keep it all to himself.
Case in bus
I hit jackpot when taking the contract on this stalker. Never seen this much loot on one guy! I should hide it all 'til things get better.
Backpack on the Barrier
The former Freedom camp on the Barrier is a perfect spot for a fat stash.
Case in village
I know this one nice stash with tons of medical supplies, but it's also got some good security... that is, the bloodsuckers. I'll have to pull up my socks for this one.
Backpack in attic
As a reward for your service, I'll give you the coordinates to a stash in the village. You'd be passing by there anyway. Just watch yourself in those parts!
Supplies

While I was on my way from the village to the farm, I had to scuttle from the bloodsuckers. Was so pumped up I even threw my backpack on the roof. I don't plan on going back myself, but you might find it useful.
Safe under car
You did me a good one, stalker! Have the coordinates to one of my artifact stashes as a reward — I didn't get the chance to retrieve it myself. Whatever you find is yours.
In case of a breakthrough

The Almighty Monolith gave us a powerful weapon, which it was decided to hide on the approaches to the Barrier, in case the stalkers break through to the Radar. No one except the Monolith brothers should know about this cache.
